Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/writing/1788876347045838848/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Best Write Article Fully SEO Optimized including Meta Description & FAQ's"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/writing/1788876347045838848/)_"
---
Write a 100% unique, no plagiarism creative and Human-written article in [TARGETLANGUAGE] for the Keyword "[PROMPT]". Use the On Page SEO concept when writing articles. The article should include Creative Title (should be in H1 Heading), SEO meta description, Introduction, headings (Shoud be h2 heading), sub headings (h3, h4,h5,h6 headings), bullet points or Numbered list (if needed), faqs and conclusion. Make sure article is plagiarism free when checked using 1 textcom. The minimum length of the article should be 700 words. Don't forget to use question mark (?) at the end of questions. Try not to change the original [PROMPT] while writing the Title. Try to use The "[PROMPT]" 2-3 times in article. Try to include [PROMPT] in headings as well.
